properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT POST_NO , THUMBNAIL_LOADPATH , POST_NAME , GP_PEOPLE , POST_LIKES , GP_PRICE , GP_DRATE , GP_DPRICE FROM GROUP_PURCHASE JOIN POST USING (POST_NO) WHERE BLIND_CHECK = 'N' AND POST_TYPE = 2 AND CATEGORY_NO = 20 ORDER BY POST_ENROLL_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
